K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-1: ma h'a sanni p'a t'a da ma h'a y'a na s'u tr'atta th'a ga ta shr'i sa ma ya n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-3: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-8: bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa chen po'i phur bu mtha' yas mu med pa lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-9: drang srong rnams kyi gnas thub pa'i rten ri ther sgra la nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:428b-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-0: de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po de na dpal lha mo chen mo chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thag mi ring @429a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-2: de nas dpal lha mo chen mo stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-5: sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar mi bgyid pa dag mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di na sems can bsod nams su gdags pa dang bral ba dag phal che lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-9: rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dir sems can rnams la snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-10: 'di na sems can rnams gang gis na rgyu ma mchis par smra zhing longs spyod dang bral la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-11: tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-12: don ma mchis par 'bad pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-13: sbyin pa rnam par bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-15: bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i go bgos te brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429a-16: 'di ltar bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-0: zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sbyin pa las @429b byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu sbyor bar bgyi ba'i dngos pos sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-2: 'di na sems can rtag par smra ba 'di dag longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-3: nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po dang bral la tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-4: de dag tshul khrims rnam par bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-5: 'dir sems can rtag par smra ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-6: tshul khrims kyi go bgos pa'i gzings kyis sems can rtag par smra ba 'di dag skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'di las bsgral bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-7: zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu spyod par bgyid pa'i dngos po sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-8: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:429b-10: 'di na sems can gang dag phra ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-1: sems kun tu spyod pa'i yid kyis de dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan zhing longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-2: nye bar spyod pa dang bral la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-3: tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-4: sems can de dag rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-5: sdom pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs pas sems can phra ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-8: gnod sems kun tu spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-9: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa spyod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag spyod par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-11: sems can de dag mi rtag pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa la 'jug par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-12: rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa'ang bdag cag gis bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-13: brtson 'grus brtsams nas bdag cag gis rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-14: zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rtag pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430a-15: sdom pas yongs su smin par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs @430b rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis par 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-3: 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-4: yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rnam par rtse ba mngon par 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-8: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis mchi ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-9: sems can rnams kyi lam gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-13: sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skem par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-14: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rdzogs par bgyid pa dag ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-15: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:430b-16: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-0: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par @431a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-1: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-7: khyod kyis gang gi tshe chos bzhi po 'di la yongs su rdzogs par spyad cing goms par byas kyang khyod kyis sems can gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-8: gang zag gzhan dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-10: de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das; de ltar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-12: zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-16: 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-17: yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yang yan lag lnga spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-18: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rtse ba mngon par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-0: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la @431b mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-1: sems can rnams kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-3: sdug bsngal gyi lam dag bskams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-4: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-5: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-6: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-7: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-9: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad kyi dang por dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-10: dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma'i dmigs pa thams cad la sems gtod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-11: de g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis dbugs rngub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-13: de dang por dbugs rngub pa'i sems kyis sel bar byed pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-14: de'i rnam par rtog pa yin no; ;de nges par 'byung ba na dbugs 'byung ba'i sems kyis sel ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-15: de'i rnam par dpyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-16: de la dga' zhing tshim pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-17: sems rtse gcig pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-18: g-yeng ba med pa gang yin pa des na de nges par 'byung ba la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:431b-19: rnam par dpyod pa spong ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-1: ltar na der des rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-2: rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-3: de la mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-4: de'i lus thams cad g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-6: der de 'dod pa'i 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-7: de mi dge ba'i chos thams cad gnon par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-8: de gang gi tshe brtson pa drag po yid la byed cing gnas pa des na de rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-9: rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-10: des na rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-11: rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa thong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-12: de ltar de'i lus thams cad shin tu sim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-16: 'o ma 'jam tsam gyis lus la gcig car blugs na bde ba myong ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-19: des zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-20: bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no snyam du shes so; ;byang chub sems dpa' des dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob nas de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432a-21: sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po bgos nas bsam gtan la'ang mngon par brtson par bya zhing bdag gis ci nas kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba'ang dor bar bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de @432b dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-1: dbugs 'byung ba goms par bya ba sems kyi dmigs pa dag 'dor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-2: de sna'i rtse mor sems gtod par byed de gang gis 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-3: nges par 'byung ba dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-4: dbugs 'byung ba la gnas pa'i sems kyis nye bar rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-5: de sems de'i skad cig ma la zhig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-7: 'jig pa nye bar rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-13: skye mched thams cad la chu zla dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-18: thams cad skad cig ma 'jig pa dang ldan par rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-19: de de ltar dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-20: bde ba rab tu gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-21: des der bsam gtan gsum pa'ang thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-22: gang du chos de dag 'phel bzhin du 'gog pa yid la byed pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de la mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-23: des mig gnyis ka btsums kyang nyi ma'i snang ba chen po lta bur snang ba dag yang dag par lta bar byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:432b-24: de 'di snyam du mtshan ma'i stobs snang ba'i rkyen las sems can thams cad kyi phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-0: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel zhing 'ngar [?] bas bdag gis ci nas @433a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-1: kyang yid la byed pa'i sems kyi dmigs pa'i snang ba dag dor bar bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-2: de der de'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-5: reg pa gang yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu byung ba dag skye zhing 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-6: 'gog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu zhi bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-7: 'gog pa'i grong khyer shin tu yongs su dag par 'jug par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-10: yid la byed pa shin tu sbyangs pa la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-11: yang de las kyang ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-12: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-13: dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma dag 'dzin par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-14: reg pa yid la byed pas mtshan ma la nye bar rtog par yang byad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-15: yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par yang byed la; yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-17: 'jig pa mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yang dag par lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-18: smon pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la'ang gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-19: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-21: 'gog pa la yang dag par lta bar yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-22: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433a-23: de la rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-0: @433b yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-1: dbugs 'byung bar mi smon cing 'jig pa'i tshul gyi dmigs pas nye bar rtog par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-2: de la yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-3: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-5: nub pa'i mtshan ma la nye bar rtog par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-6: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-7: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-8: dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma la dmigs pas nyi zer gyi rdul dang 'dra bar phye mar brlags pa bzhin du rang gi lus la nye bar rtog par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-9: de dbang po lnga sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-10: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-12: nub pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed gsum la nye bar rtog par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-13: de stobs lnga sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-14: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-15: dbugs 'gyung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma gsal ba'i tshul gyis phung po dag la zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-16: nye bar zhi bar rtog par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-17: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-18: yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:433b-19: dbugs 'byung ba'i rlung gi rnal 'byor yid la byed pas sa'i khams gzugs su snang ba thams cad rdul du brlags te gtor nas mtshan ma med pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-11: rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir ni nga yang spyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-12: sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-13: lha dang mi yi bde las rtag tu nyams pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag dang rtag tu bral ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-15: de dag la ni bdag gis lam ston 'gyur bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-16: sems can nyon mongs pa yis btson rar rtag bcings pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-17: mgon med gyur pa mig ni rnam par nyams gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-18: lta ngan dag la chags pa sha dang khrag za ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-19: de dag dag par bya phyir nga ni spyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-20: sems can re re'i don du mnar med spyod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-21: de 'dra'i snying rje sems can rnams la bskyed par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:444b-22: ji ltar sems can re re de dag thar bya'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-1: bsngal bzod rlag bzod dka' bdag gis dang du blang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-2: bu gcig nga yis byang chub spyod mchog spyad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-3: nyan thos dag gi shes pa btsal bar mi bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'ang btsal bar mi bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-5: bla na med pa'i ye shes dag ni btsal bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-6: ji srid gangg'a'i bye snyed sems can du ma dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-7: sdugg-y bsngal dag las thar par byas par ma gyur par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-8: de srid byang chub mchog rab 'dir ni 'tshang mi rgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-9: phyi nas byang chub mchog rab de la reg par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-10: bu gcig khyod kyis sems can rnams la mtshungs par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-11: snying rje 'di lta bu dag bskyed par byas nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-12: khyod kyis dge dang rtag tu ldan par byas pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-13: byang chub mchog rab 'phags pa dag tu bsngo bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-14: sems can nyon mongs me las rab tu thar bya'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-15: sdug bsngal bzod rlag bzod dka' ba dag dang du longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-16: sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa dag la legs spyod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-17: rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni the tshom med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-18: gang tshe nga ni byang chub mchog ma thob pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-19: de tshe khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sbyin por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-20: nga yis khyod ni byang chub mchog tu lung bstan nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445a-21: 'di la dam bcas brtan por legs par gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-0: de'i tshe @445b bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'di lta bur dam bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-1: bdag yun ji srid du 'khor ba na 'khor ba de srid kyi bar du brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-10: zhal ta sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-12: yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-13: gang gi tshe skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-14: nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dag gis kun tu rmongs par gyur pa'i zhing dag tu bdag gi pha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i zhing der bdag gis kyang dpal gyi go 'phang gi bdag po bla na med pa dag bstan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-15: de'i bstan pa la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-16: btung ba'i yo byad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-17: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag la bdag gis zhal zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-18: btung ba sna tshogs dag gis rim gro bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:445b-19: der de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas mngon sum du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-0: @446a *// der sems can gang dag ma rungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-6: sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rdzi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-9: char mo che dag 'bebs par byed pas gang dag sems can rnams kyi 'bru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-14: ro dag ma rungs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-16: sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-17: yongs su spyod pa dag chud gzon par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-18: mun nag tu byed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bsod nams kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-19: shes rab kyi stobs kyis bzlog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-21: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-23: gang gi tshe sems can de dag longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-24: nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas sems can de dag mi dge ba bcu la spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-25: dge ba bcu'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-26: 'di ltar de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gdul bya rnams bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-27: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-28: yo byad dag dang mi ldan pas grags pa med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446a-29: des na der bdag gis longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-0: nye @446b bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dag gis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-1: gang gi tshe 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-3: de'i tshe ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-4: de ltar smon lam btab pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-5: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal pos legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-6: zhes bya ba gnang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-8: khyod la bdag gis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sbyin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-9: khyod kyis gzungs kyi snying po 'dis de lta bur sems can rnams shin tu yongs su smin par byed nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-10: sems can tshad med pa dag longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-11: nye bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag gis nyon mongs pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-20: au ga ra bri dza lambha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:446b-24: na ma d'u ka bri dza lambha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-3: s'u tsi mu kha bri dza lambha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-7: pra ta tra bushpa pha lambha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-8: mu kshan ri bha na sa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-13: gung gung sa ra gu na tsi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-16: 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-18: gzungs kyi snying po 'dis de lta bur sems can rnams shin tu yongs su smin par byed nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po de las 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di mnos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-22: mnos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag gis mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-23: rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag byas te tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-25: brtul zhugs dag kyang spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-26: de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas khri snyed la de lta bu'i smon lam dag btab pa des na bdag gis da ltar bskal pa bzang po 'di la dpal chen po'i go 'phang thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447a-27: da ltar bdag 'dir don chen po de lta bu bgyid pa'i tshe mi nyal ba de ci'i slad dug-y zhe na; de tshun chad klu khro bo phal mo che dag byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-0: ma dad @447b pa; snying rje med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-1: snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa phal mo che dag lhags pas srog chags su gyur pa rnams la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-2: yang bar spyod pa de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-7: grang ba dag 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-11: phas kyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-14: rlung dmar dag gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-15: de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal pas byin gyis ma brlabs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-16: de dag 'jig rten pha rol la'ang mi lta bas 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di la ri mo mi byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-17: de dag sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-26: nye bar spyod pa dag chud gzon par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-29: de dag sa'i bcud rnams la dbugs gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-30: de dag gis sa'i bcud rnams skyon dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-31: snyigs ma dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-37: dri mi zhim pa dag tu byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:447b-38: de dag gis sems can rnams mngon par dga' bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-1: can gang dag sa'i bcud 'di la brten pa rnams sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-10: nye bar spyod pa dag la spyod par byed pas de dag gi sems 'jig rten pha rol la mi blta zhing sems can rnams la sems rtsub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-15: snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-16: nad sna tshogs kyis gzir cing gzugs mi sdug la lus rtsub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-18: nad du mas nyams smad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-19: lta ba ngan par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-20: skyabs ngan pa la brten pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-21: de dag ces bya ba nas ri dvags dang bya dag gi bar du dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-26: ri mo byed pa'i sems dag ma thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-27: de dag nad sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-28: lta ba ngan pas gzir cing ngan g-yo can khar bros pas dkon mchog gsum la lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-30: yid 'khrul par spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-31: sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448a-33: sdom pa ma yin pa la spyod pa de dag dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis phyug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-0: spobs pa grol ba dang ldan pa de dag gis spong @448b bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-1: da ltar 'di na sems can dag gshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-9: grags pa ma yin par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-10: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-11: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-12: dge ba thams cad la spyod pa spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-13: bsod nams dang shes rab dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-14: tshe thung zhing ngan song du 'gro ba des na sems can 'di dag thams cad de dag gis ni; longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-15: nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshim par byed kyang mi nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-16: yongs su smin par byed kyang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-17: 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa khyod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la rag ma lus par shes shing mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-22: bzod pa thams cad la rnam par spyod pa la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-23: snying rje dang snying brtse bas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-24: mkhas pa chen po shes pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:448b-26: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang na rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu gyur pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa yin pas da khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir snying rje dang snying brtse ba dag skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-1: 'di na klu khro bo dag ji ltar zlog par nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-8: lus srul po khro bo dag ji ltar zlog par nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-9: de dag ci nas kyang dus su char 'bebs shing chu 'byin par 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-10: lo tog phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-12: grang ba dus su sbyor bar 'gyur ba dag blos rtogs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-13: gzhi des sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-14: nye bar spyod pa mi nyams la sa'i bcud thams cad la'ang skyon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-16: snying po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-19: ro zhim po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-20: sa'i bcud 'di la brten pa'i sems can gang dag gi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-21: nye bar spyod pa la longs spyod pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-23: dran pa dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449a-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos dpal lha mo chen mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-0: bdag gis ni; sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po ma lus pa dag lha'i bde bar sprul nas 'dir sems can rnams bskal pa 'bum phrag snyed kyi bar du longs @449b spyod par bya bar nus kyang 'dir sems can rnams kyis longs spyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-3: bsod nams dang bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-5: nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po dag la longs spyod pa'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad lha'i gzhal med khang rgya chen por sprul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-20: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag tu sprul par nus kyang 'dir sems can de dag bsod nams dang bral bas snod du ma gyur ba'i phyir longs spyod par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-23: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa dag longs spyad par spyod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-25: bdag gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs par gzhag bar nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:449b-26: 'di na klu khro bo zhes bya ba nas lus srul po khro bo zhes bya ba'i bar dag zhi bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang @450a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-1: bar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dag bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-2: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-4: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos ma gnang bar blon po rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-5: khyim bdag rin po che dag gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shom pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma lus pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-12: chos las byung zhing chos kyis sprul pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-13: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bstan par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-16: 'on kyang chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-17: gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-18: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa dag yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-20: nga de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshig dag zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-21: da de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:450a-22: gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dag ston par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-14: 'di na klu glang po che lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-18: klu sbal pa lta bu de dag dus 'dir yang sgrub par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-19: bdag gis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa zab mo dag bstan pa na gang dag dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-25: than chen dag 'byung bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-26: sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-31: sman rnams ma rungs par bgyid pa'i klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:455b-32: klu chen po de dag ma bskrad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-1: ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-8: gling bzhi pa 'di na gang kha cig klu'i skye gnas pa de dag thams cad da ltar 'dir mchis pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-9: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir mchis pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-21: lus srul po 'dus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi dang mi yin pa de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir chos nyan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i sems can de dag thams cad zas bzhi la rten cing 'tsho bar bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-24: da lta'i dus su klu khro bo phung bar bgyid pa dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-25: gang dag klu khro bo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mngon par ma dad pas rtag par yang sgrub par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-27: sems can rnams la mtho 'tsham pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-28: sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-29: nye bar longs spyod pa dag ma rungs par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456a-30: 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-0: sems can rnams @456b la snying brtse ba ma mchis shing snying rje ma mchis par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-3: bdag sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid pa lags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-4: de dag gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sdig pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-8: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar klu yongs su smin par brtson pas smon lam btab pa ci 'dra zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-12: klu chen po klu khro bo skye gnas bzhi pa dag dbugs gdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-13: klu rnams kyi mig gdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-19: klu khro bo rnams kyi sdig pa'i chos dag ci nas kyang chos dang ldan pas bsal bar nus par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-20: ci nas kyang klu khro bo de dag gis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-22: yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:456b-23: dkon mchog gsum po de dag la dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-0: 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang bcas shing sdig pa'i chos rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur @457a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-6: bdag gis gang dag klu khro bo de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-7: gnas der zhugs te mchis nas klu rnam par bsgyings pa'i gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-8: de ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi khro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-11: 'dod chags de dag nye bar zhi bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-15: sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-16: sems can thams cad la sems byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-19: sems brtse ba can du 'gyur bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-21: klu ma rungs pa rnams dad par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-22: sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-23: gzhan yang gang dag rdzi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-29: tsha ba dag gis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457a-30: bdag gi ming brjod nas 'di skad du ri'i snying po thugs rje rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-0: @457b klu yongs su smin par mdzad pa bdag cag dran lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-1: bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-2: thabs dang ye shes sna tshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-3: bdag cag sdug bsngal las thar par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-4: yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smra ba dag gis 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-8: go gha bi re dzra bhu dza /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-14: sma ra aa barta bhu dza /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-15: ni ma bha bhu dza sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-17: sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo de dag gi rgyus gnod pa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de lta bu de dag gis bdag gi ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-22: 'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'don pa na bdag gis lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas thos nas skye gnas bzhi ba'i klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-26: klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma bgyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-27: dus ma lags par don chen ya nga ba la zhugs pa dag ma bzlog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-28: de'i tshe dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-30: dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:457b-34: 'khrug pa dag rab tu zhi bar ma bgyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-1: gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa dag yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-2: bdag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-3: bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-5: bdag gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam brtan por btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-6: shin tu gnas par gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-7: de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag snyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-8: bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu brtan par gnas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-9: zhes brtson par bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458a-10: da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang klu khro bo rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsol ba brtan po bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-0: bdag gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams @458b pa ni; bskal pa grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang btang ma myong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-1: bdag gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-2: brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bgyis lags pa rnams kyang yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-3: gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-4: klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-5: klu sprul rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-7: klu rta rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-8: klu nya rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-9: klu sbal pa rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po yid bzang 'di rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-10: klu de lta bu dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-11: sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid par rngo thogs pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-12: klu'i rgyal po gzhan dag de lta bu de dag kyang rang rang gi mthus sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid par rngo thogs pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-13: 'di ltar theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis kyang so so rang rang gi 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-14: dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur ya nga ba bsgrubs pas rang rang gi 'khor rnams bskyod par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:458b-15: 'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chos kyi sgron ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du @459a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-1: 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po klu'i drang srong la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-3: de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-5: bdag la brten pa'i klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-6: klu'i rgyal po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-8: drod dang gsher las skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-9: rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag gang na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor nyan thos rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-10: 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-11: yul 'khor der sha 'khon ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-12: gnod sems ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-13: sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-14: gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dad par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-15: de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459a-16: dbang phyug gi rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-0: dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe @459b bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-1: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-3: snod du ma gyur ba lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dzin par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-4: gzhan yang yul 'khor de na gang dag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mar gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas skrod par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-5: de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-6: bram ze bsod snyoms pa rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul pa rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-7: rgyal rigs dge ba blon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-9: skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-10: don chen la brtson pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-11: snying po blangs pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-12: lag brkyang nas lhug par gtong ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-13: rgyal rigs dge ba de yul 'khor dang bcas par bsrung bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-14: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-15: de'i yul phyogs na rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-16: so so'i 'khor dag sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-17: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-18: chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-19: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:459b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-0: mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba rnams kyi lam @460a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-2: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-4: lam las rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi sgron ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-5: phung po rnams kyi sman lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-6: ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-7: ngan 'gro rnams kyi srog shing lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-8: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi skyug sman lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-9: dgra rnams kyi rdo rje lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-11: sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi chab lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-12: nongs pa bgyid pa rnams kyi me long lags so; ;sems g-yeng ba rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-13: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi za ma tog lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sa gzhi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-15: gzungs rnams kyi nor bu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-16: bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-17: sa rnams kyi snod lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-18: phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-19: nad pa rnams kyi sman pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-20: bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-21: nyon mongs pas kun nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-22: lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-23: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-24: byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460a-25: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bum pa bzang po lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-0: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags @460b so; ;chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-1: sems can rnams la chos kyi char dbab pa'i don gyi slad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-3: 'di ltar gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing dge slong dag la mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-5: snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-7: srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-8: yul 'khor der gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-14: yi dvags mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa la gshe bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-15: de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du 'thab mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-19: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-20: dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-25: nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-32: ro rnams ma rungs par bgyid kyang de na klu rnams la skyon ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:460b-34: de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:461a-2: yul gyi bud med bzang mos zas ngan pa 'tshal na dbugs dri mi bda' bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:461a-3: de bzhin du rgyal rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid na yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas yi dvags mthu bo che dag gi bar du khros par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-4: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-6: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lda dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-7: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing der brtson pa brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-9: grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-11: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'ang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-12: des rnam par gnon pa'ang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-13: mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-14: mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-15: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-16: byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-17: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-18: de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:472b-19: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-2: klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-3: yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod pa bgyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-6: rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-7: klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-8: yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-9: gnyis gang zhe na; 'dod chags kyi dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-10: khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 'byung bar byed cing rdzi'i char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-11: ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-13: tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-14: des na 'dir sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-21: ro dag tshig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-25: de nas sems can rnams longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-26: yongs su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-28: yid kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-29: las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-31: thal bar rlog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473a-32: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-0: btung ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis de lta bur sdig pa'i las @473b mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-1: de bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar du phyis mir skye ba thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-2: gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgya la brgya la ma na mi'i lus thob nas yang kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-6: gdol ba'i rigs su yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-8: smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-9: bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-10: bza' ba dang btung ba'i longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-11: yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-12: yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-14: yid kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-15: yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-16: mnar med pa dag tu'ang gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-19: nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-20: ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-22: sdug bsngal gang cung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-23: zas kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-24: zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba'ang ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-25: de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:473b-26: sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-0: @474a *// du ba dang ni rgod par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-1: nye bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-2: kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-3: sa gzhi dag la til brdungs ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-5: lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-6: da ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-7: kye ma sred pa'i zhags pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-8: srid pa'i rtse mor mthar gtugs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-9: de ltar zhags 'di rgya che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-10: kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-11: so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-12: sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-13: ri dvags zhags pas bcings pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-14: 'bros pa dag tu nus ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-15: lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-16: sred pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-17: gar gzhung dag la gar mkhan brgyus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-18: de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-19: sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na; ;ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-20: btung ba myos bgyid bslad pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-21: myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-22: sred pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-23: skye bo brlams nas 'khyal ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-24: 'byung po'i gdon gyis myos pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-25: 'khyal ba dag tu mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-27: srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-28: gang gis sred pa bskams nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-29: de dag 'khor bar mi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-30: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-31: zhe sdang khro bas skye rgu brlams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474a-32: sems kyang g-yeng 'gyur de yis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-0: dge @474b ba thams cad mi 'tshal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-1: bzod rlag las la spyod par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-2: mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-3: pha ma dag la rim gro chung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-4: gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-5: dkon mchog gsum la brnyas par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-6: snying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-7: 'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-8: khro sems dbang gis de dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-9: sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-10: sems can 'di dag khro ba'i rgyus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-11: gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-12: yang dang yang ni ngan song du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-13: sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-14: sdig pa'i sems kyis brid gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-16: srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-17: mun pa mun nag gzhol ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-18: de 'dra'i sems can don slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i snying brtse ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-20: bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-21: sems can sdig pa bsal slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-22: byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-23: bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos sum gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-24: sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-25: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-26: sems can 'ga' yi don slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-27: lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-28: dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-29: dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-30: gang tshe sems can 'ga' slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-31: bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-32: sems can rnams slad yun ring du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-33: 'khor bar sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-34: sems can yongs su smin slad gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-35: de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-36: sems can srid pa'i bsam pa can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:474b-37: sems ni byang chub mngon bgyid stsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-1: dpal lha mo chen mos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog gis bkang pa de phul nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-2: gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-3: yongs su spyod pa dag gi rgyur sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-4: lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-5: grub par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed 'bul lo; ;des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-8: drag shul can kun tu sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-9: byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rdo thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs nas phyogs bcur bltas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-12: gang gis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-22: sems can gyi gzi byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi ro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-25: gzi byin dag mi nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-26: dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-27: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475a-28: gang gis de longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-0: nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems @475b can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-1: sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-2: byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rdo thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-3: gang gis 'dir sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-4: gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar phyogs bcu na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus par bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-11: ksha nu pra na n'i la ba ya sarba bi dza ba sti la li sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-13: zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-15: khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-17: lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-18: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-20: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin koo shi kas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-23: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:475b-26: ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-2: sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-4: bcom ldan 'das de skad ces bka' stsal nas dpal lha mo chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-7: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-011:476a-10: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa /
